name: Sports Apparel, Riding Apparel Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell athletic, sports and riding apparel, and active
wear. Such merchants may specialize in equestrian apparel, western
wear, or motocross and motorcycle wear, and may or may not also
sell athletic shoes or western boots.
